sourcesContent: // HackBrew.js import React from 'react'; import { Box, Heading, Text, List, ListItem, Container } from '@chakra-ui/react'; const HackBrew = () => { return ( Hack Brew: Fostering Inclusivity in Technology Hack Brew is not just a hackathon; it's a celebration of diversity and a platform for transformative innovation. Our aim is to create an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to the tech industry. Key Statistics 98% of participants would love to come back and recommend to a friend. 400+ participants from over 20+ countries and 150+ colleges. Join us in the next Hack Brew and be a part of a vibrant community driving innovation and inclusivity in technology! ); }; export default HackBrew;
